rules.description: 3)  <hyp-h>, <hyp-j>, <hyp-k>, <hyp-l> to left, down, up, right arrows
4)  <hyp-del> to delete word, <hyp-9> to startOfLine, <hyp-0> to endOfLine
5)  <hyp> r, t to corresponding control keys in vim
6)  <hyp-y>, system clipboard, <hyp-p> paste from reg 0 (sometimes), <hyp-u> undo
10)  <hyp-n> to <cmd-]> for iterm2, <opt-tab> for intellij - next pane
11)  <hyp-ret> to <shift,cmd,return> in iterm2, <shift,cmd,f12> in intellij - expand window
12)  intellij vscode - hyper-a to action, <hyp-dash> to cmd-up, <hyp-e> to <s-cmd-e>
13)  <hyp-f> - iterm, <hyp-u> uppercase word in insert mode
